# Setup
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(dplyr)
library(naniar)
library(skimr)
```

# Reading Data
```{r}
Fertility <- readr::read_csv("Fertility.csv") %>% 
janitor::clean_names(case="snake")
Fertility
```

```{r}
tidyr::drop_na(Fertility)
Fertility
```

```{r}
Fertility_factor <- Fertility %>%
  mutate(across(where(is.character), as.factor))
dplyr::glimpse(Fertility_factor)
```
```{r}
Fertility_relocated <- Fertility_factor %>%
dplyr:: relocate(where(is.factor), .after = rownames)
dplyr::glimpse(Fertility_relocated)
```
```{r}
Fertility_relocated %>%
  head(10) %>%
  tinytable::tt(caption = "Fertility(Clean)")
```
```{r}
Fertility_filtered <- Fertility_relocated %>% filter(afam=="yes" | hispanic=="yes" | other== "yes")
Fertility_filtered
```
